entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 7:11AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...VALDEZ GLACIER DAMMED LAKE RELEASING... Valdez Glacier Dammed Lake on the Valdez Glacier is releasing causing rises on the Valdez Glacier Lake and Stream.
